EmailTemplate.name: 12/12/12 Lunch Menu - Term 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Lunch Menu Term 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please follow the below link for the lunch menu for term 2. BSKL Term 2 Lunch Menu
Please can you make daily selections for the foundation students accordingly. We would very much appreciate if you could email by return the options selected no later than Friday 21st December. Please email your selections to cecilia.venoo@britishschool.edu.my
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
